sentences.sContent: We hooked the trailer to the back of the car.
sentences.sCn: 我们把拖车挂在汽车尾部。

sentences.sContent: a dress that hooks at the back
sentences.sCn: 从后背用钩扣的连衣裙

sentences.sContent: ...Critics say Congress will give in to lobbyists and let inefficient providers off the hook That is far less likely to happen if Congress also adopts strong "pay-go" rules requiring that any increase in payments to providers be offset by new taxes or budget cuts...
...Google will in effect be off the hook as far as copyright violations in the US are concerned...

phrases.pCn: 不择手段；用尽一切方法
挽住手臂；迷上，着迷（常用于被动语态）

words.tran: 钩状的；吸毒成瘾的；入迷的
用钩固定；捉住（hook的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to fasten or hang sth on sth else using a hook; to be fastened or hanging in this way
